title: What are the finance modules in most ERP systems? - Quora

response.answer_text: Enterprise resource planning in finance is a software platform that collects information and crafts reports: general ledgers, fixed assets, receivables, payables, cash flows, software solutions for asset finance, leasing software, automotive finance, asset finance software, leasing management, lending, contract origination and activation. etc. What does ERP stand for in finance? A financial module of an ERP system gives any business or corporation the tools for tracking all the data within one or several companies, transactions, languages, and currencies. ERP finance module features Let’s take a close look at the most common features of ERP systems. Client database. You get all the information about your clients and store it in one location. You can collect the data about financial transactions, balance sheets, and personal facts. You can grant your staff with access to this information that will be available at any time of the day or night. Accounting system. No more tons of paper waste. You turn all the paperwork into online reports and sheets that are available for anyone who has the access. All the processes become visible and transparent. Asset management. You get a simple but powerful tool for monitoring the assets and their state. You will see the depreciation in real time if it ever happens. You will also receive advanced reports that are formed in a few seconds. Financial analytics. You will see all the dashboards in real time with receivables and payables data, various types of reports and other important data units. Everything is displayed in a user-friendly way with visuals. Payment systems. If you provide clients with various payment systems, it will be easy to manage and make any updates. You will also make all the transactions more secure. Forecasting. The financial module will provide you with accurate forecasts that are based on reports and the current situation in your company. There will be comprehensive algorithms that will save you from hours of work. Other features. You will have simple billing and invoice management systems for any currency you need, keep all the financial and operational metrics in one place. If you choose a custom ERP development service, you will be able to decide what kind of features a financial module of an ERP system will have.
